rules_text: Up to two non-Human creatures you control connives, then those creatures phase out. [i](To have a creature connive, draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.)[/i]
rules_text2:
As a additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a artifact or enchantment.
Mutate a non-Human creature card from your hand onto a creature you control, then put a +1/+1 counter on each creature that mutated this turn.
